thread.title: BRIEF-Marathon Partners Delivers Letter To J. Alexander's Chairman

title: BRIEF-Marathon Partners Delivers Letter To J. Alexander's Chairman
text: February 27, 2018 / 4:34 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Marathon Partners Delivers Letter To J. Alexander's Chairman Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Marathon Partners Equity Management: * MARATHON PARTNERS DELIVERS LETTER TO J. ALEXANDER‘S CHAIRMAN FRANK MARTIRE * MARATHON PARTNERS EQUITY MANAGEMENT SAYS FIRM, AFFILIATED INVESTMENT FUNDS OWN APPROXIMATELY 6.8% OF COMMON STOCK OF J. ALEXANDER‘S HOLDINGS​ * ‍MARATHON PARTNERS EQUITY MANAGEMENT- RECOMMENDS J ALEXANDERS BOARD APPOINT NEW, INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS‍​ * MARATHON PARTNERS EQUITY MANAGEMENT SAYS URGES J. ALEXANDER‘S HOLDINGS TO FORM SPECIAL COMMITTEE OF INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS TO EXPLORE ALL STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES * ‍MARATHON PARTNERS EQUITY MANAGEMENT- ALSO URGES J. ALEXANDER FOR ENGAGEMENT OF INDEPENDENT INVESTMENT BANK TO EXPLORE STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
